016package org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain;
017
018import java.util.Collection;
019import java.util.Collections;
020
021/**
022 * Sn position level according to the 2020 update of the Liebisch shorthand
023 * nomenclature.
024 *
025 * @author Dominik Kopczynski
026 * @author Nils Hoffmann
027 * @see LipidLevel
028 */
029public class LipidSnPosition extends LipidMolecularSpecies {
030
031    public LipidSnPosition(Headgroup _headgroup, KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups) {
032        this(_headgroup, Collections.emptyList(), knownFunctionalGroups);
033    }
034
035    public LipidSnPosition(Headgroup _headgroup, Collection<FattyAcid> _fa, KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups) {
036        super(_headgroup, _fa, knownFunctionalGroups);
037        info.setLevel(LipidLevel.SN_POSITION);
038        
039        int pos = 1;
040        for (FattyAcid fatty_acid : faList){
041            fatty_acid.position = pos++;
042        }
043    }
044
045    @Override
046    public LipidLevel getLipidLevel() {
047        return LipidLevel.SN_POSITION;
048    }
049
050    @Override
051    public String getLipidString() {
052        return getLipidString(LipidLevel.NO_LEVEL);
053    }
054
055    @Override
056    public String getLipidString(LipidLevel level) {
057        switch (level) {
058            case NO_LEVEL, SN_POSITION -> {
059                return buildLipidSubspeciesName(LipidLevel.SN_POSITION);
060            }
061            case MOLECULAR_SPECIES, CATEGORY, CLASS, SPECIES -> {
062                return super.getLipidString(level);
063            }
064
065            default ->
066                throw new IllegalArgumentException("LipidSnPosition does not know how to create a lipid string for level " + level.toString());
067        }
068    }
069
070}
